title: at 999 wins heard it might be possible to get a game with a Rioter... for my 1000th win.
body:
I'm at 999 wins was hoping to play with someone from riot for my 1000th win.  I have my two sons (19 & 22) set up in my office on a lan.  I got into LOL to play with them and have really enjoyed the game.  My son noticed that i was at 999 wins and since he reads the forums mentioned that i may be able to play with a rioter for my 1000th.  We have a fourth person, one of my sons friends who lives down the street. Curse Voice would be an option.  Please message me in game or respond to this post if this is possible.  
Thankyou   
Taylor
aka ShoDown

replies.body: I've got a few hours today, although I just jumped in a ranked game right now. Toss me a friend invite if you're still free and looking, Shodown. ;-)
Thanks a ton, sorry I was slow to reply. I've sent the friend request. Let me know either in game or here if you're still available, and thanks again.

DID YOU GET YOUR WIN??

*sizzles inquisitively*
Still hoping to play a game with a rioter.

When I was gonna hit 2k wins I asked a friend to post to reddit to see if I could get a game with Brackhar. He agreed, but then I got myself banned when we had scheduled to play. >.> Never did get the chance to play with him.

But they do agree to it, but it's probably for the best if you ask for one personally. I picked Brackhar because he designed my favorite champion, maybe you could seek one out that way?
